1414300.name: BeetleQuest
1414300.description:
BeetleQuest is an adventure game inspired by games like King’s Quest and Legends of Kyrandia. It is based on children’s books and fairytales, and is suitable for all ages!

Story

In BeetleQuest, three beetle friends, Magnus, Boris and Dagmar are playing with their most cherished marble, when Boris accidentally shoots it down into a molehill.

The mole inside becomes very angry for he has suffered a huge bump on his head. He refuses to return the marble. He says he will only give the marble back if the beetlefriends give him a nice gift in return.

And so, their quest begins! Off they go to search for a nice gift for the mole so they can get their precious marble back.

Features

* A charming story with lots of point & click goodness.

* Fully hand-drawn backgrounds, characters and animations.
* Three beetles to choose from. Play as Magnus, Dagmar, or Boris.
* Visit exciting places, like a mysterious swamp, a dark cave, and even a land underwater!

Extra's

* The game is also fully in Dutch.

* The old, pre-remake version of the game is available via the Beta branch.
1414300.supported_languages:
英语*, 荷兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
